note.p: Death: Bedford Circus, Exeter, Devon (20 November 1810)
Burial: St Stephen's Church, Exeter, Devon
Career: Settled in Exeter and set up practice; Physician, Devon and Exeter Hospital (1775); wrote "The London medical dictionary ..." (1809)
References: N G Coley, 'George Pearson MD, FRS (1751-1828): 'The greatest chemist in England'? in NR 2003 vol 57 pp
